name: FInputActionInstance
doc:
Run time queryable action instance
Generated from UInputAction templates above

SourceAction: The source action that this instance is created from
LastTriggeredWorldTime: The last time that this evaluated to a Triggered State
ElapsedProcessedTime: Total trigger processing/evaluation time (How long this action has been in event Started, Ongoing, or Triggered
ElapsedTriggeredTime: Triggered time (How long this action has been in event Triggered only)
